item.title: Boot Camp on External Drive
item.description: I had a spare SSD and a USB enclosure for it. Installing windows on an external drive is unsupported by Microsoft and the setup will abort stating Windows cannot be installed on an external drive. Here is how I managed to install Windows 10 Pro on the external SSD and boot from it on my iMac.
